mean_cn: n. 顾问，法律顾问，参事
mean_en: a person who provides advice as a job :a person who counsels people
word_etyma: counsel咨询+or表示人→顾问；法律顾问；参事（等于counsellor）
short_phrase: A patient counselor listens to her.
sentence: The counselors will always help you when you have a problem.
sentence_trans: 你有任何问题，咨询师都会帮你的。
